text: Abdul Rahim Ansari (Nepali: अब्दुल रहिम अंसारी) is a Nepalese politician. He is a member of Provincial Assembly of Madhesh Province from People's Socialist Party, Nepal. Ansari, a resident of Sakhuwa Prasauni Rural Municipality, was elected via 2017 Provincial Assembly of Madhesh Province elections from Parsa 3(A). == References == Category:Living people Category:Nepalese politicians
title: Abdul Rahim Ansari
